languages.text: {n}Сквозь стук колотящегося сердца вы слышите голос Злобы, доносящийся издалека:{/n} "Заштопайте людишко. Меня позабавили е{mf|го|е} мольбы".
{n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь стук колотящегося сердца вы слышите голос Злобы, доносящийся издалека:{/n} "Заштопайте людишко. Меня позабавили е{mf|го|е} мольбы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}通过心脏的跳动，你听到恶棍的声音从遥远的地方传了过来。{/n}“给这个小人儿包扎一下，{mf|他|她}的恳求让我觉得很有意思。”
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."

traits.locale_text: {n}通过心脏的跳动，你听到恶棍的声音从遥远的地方传了过来。{/n}“给这个小人儿包扎一下，{mf|他|她}的恳求让我觉得很有意思。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Por encima del tambor de tu corazón, oyes la voz lejana de Malicia:{/n} «Tratad a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. Sus súplicas me han entretenido».
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por encima del tambor de tu corazón, oyes la voz lejana de Malicia:{/n} «Tratad a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. Sus súplicas me han entretenido».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}心臓の鼓動の合間に、遠くからマリスの声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「この人間を手当てしろ。十分楽しませてもらった」
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."

traits.locale_text: {n}心臓の鼓動の合間に、遠くからマリスの声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「この人間を手当てしろ。十分楽しませてもらった」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Über das Getrommel deines Herzens hörst du Tückes Stimme irgendwo aus der Ferne:{/n} "Flickt den Menschling zusammen. {mf|Sein|Ihr} Flehen hat mich amüsiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Über das Getrommel deines Herzens hörst du Tückes Stimme irgendwo aus der Ferne:{/n} "Flickt den Menschling zusammen. {mf|Sein|Ihr} Flehen hat mich amüsiert."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Sous les battements de votre cœur, vous entendez la voix de Démon au loin :{/n} « Remettez l'{mf|humain|humaine} sur pied. Ses supplications m'ont amusé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous les battements de votre cœur, vous entendez la voix de Démon au loin :{/n} « Remettez l'{mf|humain|humaine} sur pied. Ses supplications m'ont amusé. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Kalp atışlarının arasında Melanet'in uzaktan gelen sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "İnsancığın yaralarına bir bakın. Yakarışlarıyla beni eğlendirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Through the drumbeat of your heart, you hear Malice's voice from somewhere far away:{/n} "Patch up the humanling. {mf|His|Her} pleas have amused me."
